body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
I would like a workflow to be executed once every 15 seconds, but the fastest I can schedule a cron is once per minute using
```
Opts: client.StartWorkflowOptions{
  ID: "blah",
  CronSchedule: "* * * * *",
}
```

**Describe the solution you'd like**
Being able to control which seconds a workflow is triggered would be nice. So once a minute would be `0 * * * * *` (note that there's 6 tokens instead of 5), and once every 15 seconds would be `*/15 * * * * *`.
title: Support Cron Schedules faster than per minute for workflows
